DataElement.preferredName: PLCOm2012 Lung Cancer Model Score Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The score obtained from logical regression lung cancer risk model, based on data from the Prostate, Lung, Colorectal and Ovarian Cancer Screening Trial (PLCO), that incorporates 11 predictors, including age, smoking status, smoking intensity, duration of smoking, and duration of quitting, to estimate the six-year lung cancer risk in individuals who have greater than or equal to 30 pack-years of smoking and less than 15 years since quitting.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A logical regression lung cancer risk model, based on data from the Prostate, Lung, Colorectal and Ovarian Cancer Screening Trial (PLCO), that incorporates 11 predictors, including age, smoking status, smoking intensity, duration of smoking, and duration of quitting, to estimate the six-year lung cancer risk in individuals who have greater than or equal to 30 pack-years of smoking and less than 15 years since quitting._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A logical regression lung cancer risk model, based on data from the Prostate, Lung, Colorectal and Ovarian Cancer Screening Trial (PLCO), that incorporates 11 predictors, including age, smoking status, smoking intensity, duration of smoking, and duration of quitting, to estimate the six-year lung cancer risk in individuals who have greater than or equal to 30 pack-years of smoking and less than 15 years since quitting.

Concepts.definition: A logical regression lung cancer risk model, based on data from the Prostate, Lung, Colorectal and Ovarian Cancer Screening Trial (PLCO), that incorporates 11 predictors, including age, smoking status, smoking intensity, duration of smoking, and duration of quitting, to estimate the six-year lung cancer risk in individuals who have greater than or equal to 30 pack-years of smoking and less than 15 years since quitting.

Property.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Top level term which includes Biological Markers, Risk Factors, and Prognostic Factors.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
